name: Savior Sea
description:
SEAJAM 2021 submission

Too much garbage has been thrown into the ocean and the sea life have become violent as the trash covers their body. It's your job to cleanse the inhabitants of the coral reef of the trash. Fight through 10 rooms of trashed fish with a powerful boss at the end.

Developer Note:

This is my first ever game jam, so please let me know your opinions on my game in the comments! I wasn't able to add as much content as I would have liked but I might come back to it later to finish it up. (There is currently no audio because I ran out of time)
